title: Application Developer Intern (Blockchain)
details: Developed backend services for digital assets custody and exchange using Spring Boot. Implemented a login and dashboard web app in 3 weeks for a DBS Metaverse event using Angular. Experimented with automated software testing and trained a small team using Selenium

title: Teaching Assistant / Grader
details: Provided detailed feedback on assignments, ensuring students know why they lose marks. Engaged students in private 1-to-1 online consultations daily during Covid. Wrote progress reports and feedback to administration in order to accommodate students' academic needs and goals

title: Software Engineer Intern (Mobile Front-End)
details: Developed both iOS/Android mobile app for Republic Polytechnic (RP) using React Native. Started prototyping an internal automation project using UiPath, VB.Net and C#, to reduce manual data entry for company accountants. Research was then presented to the company executives to purchase software licenses and officially setup an automation workflow in the company

title: Game Developer Intern (Unity)
details: Worked together with an 3D artist on a kids arcade game prototype made in Unity. Introduced to essential communication tools such as JIRA, Git, Slack and Scrum. Experience professional teamwork and being part of a game development team and learn the importance of 'Beer Fridays'
